name: Nike
description: Nike, Inc. is an American multinational corporation which is the world's largest supplier and manufacturer of athletic shoes, apparel and other sports equipment.

name: Adidas
description: Adidas is a German manufacturer of sports equipment. Adidas is a small European manufacturer of sports equipment. The logo of this company represents three parallel lines.

name: Puma
description: Puma is a German multinational sports equipment manufacturer based in Herzogenaurach, Bavaria.Puma is known as a sponsor of Jusein Bolt and the athletic team from Jamaica.

name: Mizuno
description: Mizuno Corporation is a Japanese sports equipment and sportswear company. A wide variety of sports:  golf, tennis, baseball, volleyball, football, running, rugby, skiing, swimming, cycling, judo, table tennis, badminton, boxing and athletics.
